org.mocksy
Class Response

java.lang.Object
  org.mocksy.Response
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpResponse
public class Response
extends Object

Basic abstraction for a service response.

Constructor Summary
Response(String id, InputStream content)
          Creates a response with given content and content type.
Response(String id, InputStream content, List<ResponseFilter> filters)
          Creates a response with given content, content type, and a list of filters.

          Creates a response with given content and content type.

          Returns the MIME content type for this response.

public int getDelay()

Returns:

setDelay

public void setDelay(int delay)
Sets the amount of time to delay the processing of the response. The argument provided defines the time in milliseconds for the mock server to wait before returning the response. This makes it easier to simulates real server processing a little better.

Parameters:
delay - time of delay in milliseconds
